=== Subject: Re: Rx Refill

=== From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

=== To: Admin BCBC <apptsbcbc@gmail.com>

=== Cc: christine moyer <christinemoyer@hotmail.com>
Date Sent: Monday, January 29, 2024 12:50:33 PM GMT-08:00
Date Received: Monday, January 29, 2024 12:50:33 PM GMT-08:00
Super!
Thanks so much for the commitment and follow through!
Christine and I will get a date on the books for Max’s follow soon!
best

=== From: Admin BCBC <apptsbcbc@gmail.com>
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2024 12:45:15 PM

=== To: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

=== Cc: chrisne moyer <chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com>

Hello,
Dr. Kwon has sent a 90-day prescription to Walgreen's. Also, at your earliest convenience, he would like you to make a
follow-up appointment for late April. It needs to be in person. You can call us to schedule, or you can use Dr. Kwon's
scheduling page:
https://DrHowerKwon.as.me/
If you use the scheduling page, please ensure the patient's name is the one listed.
Thank you!
Kind regards, Beth

=== Subject: Re: Rx Refill

=== From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

=== To: Admin BCBC <apptsbcbc@gmail.com>,christine moyer <christinemoyer@hotmail.com>
Date Sent: Friday, January 26, 2024 2:32:54 PM GMT-08:00
Date Received: Friday, January 26, 2024 2:32:55 PM GMT-08:00
Hi Beth!
Naturally, we have been doing this for a while. And I do understand that’s generally the case, but in the past, at local
pharmacies, we have had both Ritalin and Adderall in 90 day supplies after the first few were filled at #30.
I have sat in Dr Kwan’s office discussing the number of times we needed to do the 3O day Rx before we can do 90 days. So
this conversation is a road well traveled.
Are we sure that is not the case here as well? Could it be because we have not had the Rx long enough, as it is new to Max?
Really not trying to be difficult, just want to be sure we are saying the same thing.
Thanks!
robert

=== From: Admin BCBC <apptsbcbc@gmail.com>
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2024 1:29:24 PM

=== To: chrisne moyer <chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com>

=== Cc: rob.moyer@gmail.com <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

Hello,
Thank you for providing those details! We appreciate it. Dr. Kwon has sent the prescription to your pharmacy. For
Lisdexamfetamine, only 30-day prescriptions are allowed at local pharmacies. You might check with your insurance to see
whether using their mail-order pharmacy would be an option, since those tend to be 90-day prescriptions.
Kind regards,
Beth

Date Sent: Tuesday, January 23, 2024 7:19:23 PM GMT-08:00
Date Received: Tuesday, January 23, 2024 7:19:26 PM GMT-08:00
Hi,
40mg
Lisdexamfetamine or generic

Walgreens, 12405 ne 85th street, Kirkland, Wa 98033
30 days is what the current prescription is but if you can do longer, 90 days that would be preferable.
Please let me know if you need any additional details
Thank you
Christine

Outlook for iOS

=== From: Admin BCBC <apptsbcbc@gmail.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 23, 2024 3:37 PM

=== To: chrisne moyer <chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com>

=== Cc: rob.moyer@gmail.com <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

Hello,
Thank you for your email! We are asking for a little more information now with prescriptions to streamline the process. Can
you let us know the strength of the medication, any requirements or preferences regarding brand name or generic, the name
and address of your pharmacy, and how many days the prescription should be for?
We also want to remind families to allow two business days for prescriptions to be completed, since we get a high volume of
requests. Dr. Kwon wants families to know that if prescriptions need to be sent in faster, families may be billed.
Kind regards,
Beth

You are such an F’ing game player.

=== Subject: Fw: My Truth

=== From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

=== To: Lisa Ann Sharpe <sharpe@lasher.com>

=== Cc: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
Date Sent: Friday, April 5, 2024 3:30:59 PM GMT-07:00
Date Received: Friday, April 5, 2024 3:31:01 PM GMT-07:00
Attachments: OFW_Messages_Report_2024-04-05_15-21-29.pdf
This is the evoluon of her story aer Yurshaka.
It's called "My Truth," so we can be prepared for the worst.
I'm sharing this as it is her "go-to" account presented to each therapist as we start fresh. Some of it definitely happened,
and I contributed to it disproporonately. But much of it is also an exaggeraon or flat-out did not happen. The only people
who could have borne witness are the ones she is brainwashing (my kids).
Note Chrisne will only engage under any circumstances if
she can go second. I agree, I know the drill, I start as the villan.
That is ok, I did a lot of this. But then they get to know us (maybe the kids too), the chronology of accusaons, recent
demonstrated history, and how the status quo is working out for all involved.
Advice has always been to look forward and quit pung the kids in the middle and using them for personal retribuon.
They will make some reasonable "child-centered" recommendaons. I adopt in full, like them or not. Chrisne ignores
them and is ready to move on... rinse | repeat
Also-
please see aached. I called out the issue with AD months ago, before Dr Brown Round II. I offer safe and sound
parenng advice at every step in this godawful journey. I knew AD was in a rough place. I was worried he might want to
commit self-harm in Jan and tried to address it. She would refuse to allow that.

Her paern is doing enormous harm to our kids, so we should take their tesmony in the context of how it was created.
There is no mystery here.

=== From: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 6, 2024 5:58 PM

January 6, 2024 5:55:36 PM

=== To: rob.moyer@gmail.com <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

Even in this state the scary controlling manipulative behavior continues.
No one is surprised I took this step. You are the only one who is puzzled.

=== From: chrisne moyer <chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com>
Sent: Wednesday,
July 26, 2023 6:25 PM

=== To: Rob Moyer <rob.moyer@gmail.com>

Some reasons for why separaon from the marriage is the right step for me at this point in my life.
• Freedom to no longer feel scared, controlled, manipulated, disrespected and abused.
• To allow the possibility for me to heal and reach my full potenal.
• To be away from my abuser for the past 25 years.
• Real desire to feel safe at all mes.
• Feelings for how my body and mind feel in his presence.
• The trauma and sadness that I allowed and tolerated the behavior for 25 years.
• It was normalized but is actually crazy and in no way acceptable in any one of the instances let alone hundreds of
incidents that have occurred repeatedly.
• Physical, emoonal and mental inmidaon.
• Fear for my safety is always present, knowing things can change in an instant.
• Always having a plan B and never allowing to be in a situaon that I cannot escape (i.e. on a cruise with no path for
escape)
• Hatred and self loathing for myself that I allowed it to connue for so long, and the impact it has had on me, the kids
and how I show up to family and friends.
• Recognion that I can surround myself with people that truly support and value my contribuons and would not
even be capable for treang me in any way for any one aspect that I have been subject to.
• Name calling, gaslighng, disrespect.
• Need the space to be free from this and from his control.
• Marriage allows him the control and ability to potenally subject me to any aspect of emoonal, physical and mental
manipulaon at any me that he feels is appropriate - for however in his mind is jusfied.
• Control for I how feel, show up and what I do.
• Loss of respect for a partner that has demonstrated an ability to treat me in this way for such a prolonged period and
failed to recognize the impact and trauma it has had on me.
• Can no longer be a party to a relaonship that has had such a profound and detrimental impact to me.
• Ready for a new chapter and beginning.
Trauma
• Mulple DUI's and trauma from navigang the lead up to incidents, managing incident (bail bonds, jail, probaon
period, relapses while on probaon, lies etc) and post impact on life.
• Connuous empty boles - lies, gaslighng, decepve behavior, abuse - Yelling, screaming, physical.
• Threats of deportaon - impact to safety and fear of liveihood and kids
• Ruined vacaons
Hawaii - Departed early and navigang emoons, physical, fear. Trying to stabilize given colleagues' room,
threats of self harm.

Whistler - Lost kid on mountain, hiding fact from friends, smashed cup, security called, intense and prolonged
screaming of abusive name calling, running for border at midnight, hidden passports, crossing border wasted
Cabo - Drunken nights, long disappearances, hidden boles, aggressive behavior to family, guests, hotel staff.
Hong Kong - Disappearances, scaring my parents, broken bones, inappropriate behavior, screaming and abuse.
Acons on planes - trying to manage drunkardness on planes and in airports
Florida/Alabama - drunken behaviour, disappearance, aggressiveness, lost wallet, managing out of control,
trashing apartment, self harm.
40 Birthday - Knife incident, cancelled flight, checking into hotel, finding cab, geng on plane as tried to scale
fence drunk
• Ruined holidays
Every single one. Passed out, aggressiveness, screaming, shoung
• Restaurants - checked out, embarrassing behavior
• Oungs
Park example, embarrassing behavior
• Trying to prevent drunk driving - hood of car, hiding keys,
In car wile he is driving drunk - trying to race, fear for safety
• Escaping scary behavior - running out of house with no shoes carrying kids, escaping to others place, going to Lisa's
place
• Pregnancy - locked in garage, loss of weight
• Mulple infidelies while pregnant. One lasng span of 2 years despite being in the healthiest state. Gaslighng
and fall out.

=== From: LOCALHOOPS Training Academy <
no-reply@mailer.sportsengine.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 29, 2023 11:49:42 AM
To:
chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com <chrisnemoyer@hotmail.com>

For the first time in LOCALHOOPS 11 year history, we will
be combining our Fall & Winter seasons for the upcoming
2023-24 season! Tryouts for our Fall & Winter season will
take place the week of August 20-27th. Below are

Age Groups
Boys 1st-12th grade

Season Length
8th grade and under season will run mid September
through Presidents Day in February.
9-12th will begin mid Sept and finish mid November

Fall & Winter Offerings
During our Fall & Winter season we will offer the
following programs:
*Competitive Game Play: AAU teams for boys & girls with
local and travel game play
*Skill Develop Sessions: Group, Semi & Private Training
options available weekly
*Lions League: Our in house program that offers one
team training practice and one game per week grades 4-
12th boys & girls
*Development League: Introduction to basketball: 1st-3rd
grade team training once per week. Fundamentals of
basketball

Fall/Winter Season Season Expectations
This is a reminder that athletes looking to play during the
Fall OR Winter season must attend this one tryout. In the
Winter we will have a tryout only to fill any open spots in
the program. Athletes who make a team during our main
tryout August 20-27th will have secured spots all the way
through Winter season

2023-24 Fall & Winter Combined

~ the localhoops team
